0: typical business hotel the room was small and bit crowded the bathroom small as well very clean and confortable internet connection was not so great typical european breakfast very very small gym area around the hotel nice
The breakfast was excelentI prefer a separate toilet and there were water stains on the ceiling of the corridor
The morning buffet breakfast is okay but I feel bored at the third day since the food is exactly the same everyday
Ate at the restaurant twice and found it decent if slightly expensive
Paying 22 Euros for breakfast is to me on the high side
The one serious drawback restaurant bar forgetful service over priced no TLC eg a bit of bread with my so called pasta bolognese
The automatic sensor minibar refrigirator arrangement with fully stuffed referring not allowing any space for own snacks and other personal keep cold items
Breakfast is rather expensive if booked at arrival

Front desk staff was very nice and upgraded me to a Club Room which unfortunately looks absolutely nothing special to me at all other than free wifi there is no welcome fruit cookie plate and the room is just about the same size cramped as any Holiday Inn room except the furniture may be a bit nicer
It must have seemed a good idea to some geek but not to a travelerIf you take an item out of the mini bar to examine it look at alcohol content preservatives etc
1: A nice hotel with good facilities and located well near good restaurants
Club lounge one of the best with decent snacks and drinks throughout the day
Rooms are very nice breakfast was great too
Nice selection of complimentary teas in the lobby
A couple of blocks away there is a cluster of restaurants so plenty of choice
The room was fantastic and the breakfast was great for a hotel under renovations I think the price was a little ambitious but I would return
Breakfast is very rich and tasty variety of choice
Very comfy bed nice room decor amazing breakfast not huge quantity of food but very delicious and very quiet place in walking distance to centrum 15 20mins walk
